alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 9:57AM EDT until June 21 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Lanier County in south central Georgia... Southern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 1045 AM EDT. * At 956 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Madison to near Jennings, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Twin Lakes, Cherry Lake, Pinetta, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, Nankin, Clyattville and I-75 At Exit 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
